attributes.action: provide more government funding for developing nuclear fusion technology
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of nuclear research contructed throughout the world is examining Nuclear Fission. However I propose that, as a nation, we should research nuclear fusion more deeply as the only waste produced is Helium which is harmless to the planet. Making Nuclear Fusion a renewable energy source, with no waste.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to provide more government funding for developing nuclear fusion technology.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=NuclearFusion


Her Majesty's Government
